# The insertion of 10 units of Copper Ore into the Stone Furnace was successful, and the furnace now has 8 units of Copper Ore remaining along with 5 Copper Plates already produced. 
# The furnace status is now "WORKING," indicating that it is actively processing the Copper Ore.

# Since the furnace is operational and has sufficient coal, I will wait to see if it completes the smelting process for the remaining Copper Ore.
# I will wait for a maximum of 30 seconds to check if the furnace produces additional Copper Plates.

for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)[Prototype.CopperPlate] >= 10:  # Check if 10 Copper Plates are produced.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After waiting, I will check my inventory to confirm the number of Copper Plates produced.
print(f"Inventory after waiting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking inventory after waiting for smelting to complete.
